about_the_game:
Enter the Maze, Conquer the Darkness

Prepare to immerse yourself in Labyrinth of Shadows, an exhilarating dungeon crawler that will test your wits and bravery. Navigate through a treacherous grid of hidden dangers, a lurking creature, and tantalizing treasures. Surround sound audio emerces you in the gameplay so you can feel like you are actually there.

Key Features:

  • Strategic Exploration: Delve into a maze of obscurity where every step could lead to a treasure or your doom. Use your instincts and memory to uncover secrets and avoid deadly traps.
  • Dynamic Obstacles: Face off against the mysterious creature, dodge deadly pits, and outsmart an array of dynamic challenges that evolve as you progress.
  • Unique Artifacts: Discover powerful artifacts like the Flame Bow, Guide Stone, and Vaulting Boots. Each artifact offers unique abilities to help you survive and thrive in the dungeon.
  • Tactical Combat: Use your archery skills to defeat the creature and clear your path to victory. Gather torches to light up the dungeon and bring the creature out of the shadows.
  • Engaging Storyline: Uncover the secrets of the Labyrinth of Shadows as you progress, piecing together the lore of a forgotten world and the ancient evil that lies within.
  • Challenging Levels: With procedurally generated dungeons, each playthrough offers a new challenge. Adapt your strategies, find the best routes, and become the master of the labyrinth.





Why You'll Love It:

  • Gameplay: Every level presents a unique challenge that will keep you coming back for more.
  • Immersive Atmosphere: The combination of retro visuals and captivating sound design creates a truly immersive dungeon-crawling experience.
  • Replayability: Procedural generation and a variety of artifacts ensure that no two adventures are ever the same.

Do you have what it takes to conquer the Labyrinth of Shadows? Gather your courage, sharpen your skills, and embark on an unforgettable journey into the heart of darkness. The treasure awaits those brave enough to seek it.



*Currently in Beta Development*
This game is in thel late stages of beta development and will still be upon release, so expect more content to come soon!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 (Sierra) or later
  • Processor: Intel Dual-core CPU @ 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support openGL 3.3
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina) or later
  • Processor: Intel Dual-core CPU @ 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support openGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Labyrinth Of Shadows

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: OS: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU @ 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 series / AMD Radeon HD 2000 series / Intel HD Graphics (1st Gen) or equivalent with OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU @ 3.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870 / Intel Iris Pro Graphics 5200 or equivalent with OpenGL 4.0 support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Dive into the Labyrinth of Shadows, a game that challenges your wits and bravery. Navigate dungeons filled with traps, enemies, and hidden treasures. Use unique artifacts to overcome obstacles and uncover secrets. With procedurally generated levels, each playthrough offers a new adventure.
